## French National Day in Grenoble

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
Every year, the French National Day resounds with music and fireworks across the nation. In Grenoble, **the sky will light up on 14 July**, bringing smiles to both young and old. Arrive a day early to enjoy the celebrations happening not only in Grenoble but throughout cities across France.
:::
::: {.column width="5%"}

## Welcome Reception

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
On Tuesday July 15, join us for an unforgettable Welcome Reception at the historic **Bastille of Grenoble**, perched high above the city with stunning views of the Alps. **Arrive by cable car** and enjoy local delicacies, fine wines, and engaging conversations in this iconic setting. Surrounded by the Bastille’s **ancient fortifications**, it’s the perfect opportunity to connect with fellow delegates and set the tone for the conference ahead.
:::

## Tour of Grenoble

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
Between the Welcome Reception and the Gala Dinner, Wednesday evening will be left free for attendees. However, we are pleased to propose an **optional city tour** in collaboration with the Grenoble Office du Tourisme. Please note that this tour is not included in the conference fees and requires separate booking.

## Gala Dinner

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
On Thursday July 17, we are pleased to invite you to the Gala Dinner, held at the prestigious **Stade des Alpes**. This modern venue, set against the **stunning backdrop of the Alps**, offers a stylish and spacious setting for an evening of fine dining and celebration. Join us for a night of culinary excellence and networking at the remarkable Stade des Alpes!
